front.title: Sith Probe Droid (V)
front.gametext: When drawn for destiny during a battle or duel involving a Dark Jedi, destiny +2. During your move phase, may use 2 Force to relocate a Dark Jedi (with any captives they are escorting) to same site; place this droid in Used Pile.
front.lore: Patrol droids utilized by the Sith. Each droid has several multispectral imaging devices and a communications package. Used by Maul to track down Amidala.

conceptBy: (Original concept by Lee Clarke - ACT Championship 2005)
